subject: Politics
title: Food as a Weapon
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Food as a Weapon.

hook.text: Russia's invasion of Ukraine sent wheat prices soaring. Millions in Africa faced famine from a distant war.

buildup.text: Food security is a national security issue. Nations that can't feed themselves depend on those that can.

punchline.text: Whoever controls the food supply holds power over the hungry.
